duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, configure, and maintain IT infrastructure including servers, SAN, network switches, and storage systems.
Assess system performance, provide capacity planning and growth projections, and perform software installations and upgrades.
Create and maintain server and systems documentation, and perform daily administrative maintenance tasks on infrastructure equipment.
Responsible for deployment projects of new systems, including design, architecture, and training of new systems.
Assist with help desk tickets and end-user support when required, and continuously maintain proficiency within the IT industry.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Management, or a related field of study is preferred
